name: Piscean
description: Legs of a man, torso and tail of a fish. They break into granaries, batter the nightguards with their blubbery tails, stuff their bellies full of feed, and run off into the night to digest in a local lake. They are menaces!

special.name: Special Ability
special.description: If they incapacitate a party member all Pisceans that are able will descend on them and eat all their Provisions

special.name: Special Ability
special.description: Each will consume one Provision per Turn
